  Item   Financial                
  9.01.  Statements and Exhibits  
                                  
Exhibits are filed herewith in connection with
the Registration Statement on Form S-3 (File
No. 333-239017) filed by Wells Fargo & Company
and Wells Fargo Finance LLC with the
Securities and Exchange Commission.

On July 31, 2020, Wells Fargo & Company issued
the following Medium-Term Notes, Series T: (i)
Notes due October 31, 2029; and (ii) Notes due
October 31, 2026 (collectively, the “Notes”).

The purpose of this Current Report is to file
with the Securities and Exchange Commission
the form of Note related to each issuance and
the opinion of Faegre Drinker Biddle & Reath
LLP regarding the Notes.
(d) Exhibits
